Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Votes.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Title: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions of law relating to the operation of personal watercraft and specialty prop-craft
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions of law relating to the operation of personal watercraft and specialty prop-craft.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 138 of the laws of 1998, amending the navigation law and the state finance law relating to the operation of personal watercraft and specialty prop-craft, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
